credit_line: Museum purchase from Smithsonian Institution Collections Acquisition Program and Sarah Cooper- Hewitt Funds
title: Figure Pin #147 (Wingnut and Errant Dandelion)
medium: Maple, copper electroform, brass, silver, carved Plexiglas, Delrin, gold leaf
description: Brooch composed of two components: gold leaf-covered carved maple form of human-like figure with leafy head, in a running stance and holding weeding fork (a); the other, a dandelion (b).  Stand (c) in the form of a shadow box frame; brooch parts a and b hang on metal posts positioned so that the figure appears to be chasing the dandelion.
name: Brooch with stand
